name: Mirrored Actions
description:
You have to collect as many coins as you can... Sounds easy, right? There is one small problem... You have two players doing the same actions! The good thing is that they only receive damage from the enemies with the same color.

Movement: WASD - Jump: Space

This is my First Jam  ever and I finished a game in 48hs (LOOK AT ME MOM!)... actually less than 48hs, more like 10hs but the journey taught me a lot!

Will you share your high score? Good Luck!
